name: South Tourism
overview:
South Tourism, a leading ground handling agency in South India. We provide customized tour packages for all the destinations. We majorly covers South India Tour Package, Kerala Culture & Culinary Experience, Exotic Tamilnadu & Kerala Tour , Karnataka & Kerala Tour, Goa & Kerala Tour Package, South India Hill Station Tour, Tamil Nadu Pilgrimage Tour Package, Kerala Ayurvedic Tours, Navagraha Temple Tour Package is also one of our main expertise.

We are recognized by the Ministry of Tourism, Government of India. We are an active member of Indian Association of Tour Operators (IATO), Travel Agents Association of India (TAAI), Federation of Indian Export Organization (FIEO) & Kerala Travel Mart Society (KTM). It has spread its presence in different states of South India, by its network of offices in Tamilnadu, Karnataka & Kerala. We arrange only qualified, licensed English speaking Guides, arrange exclusive Houseboat cruises on the backwaters around Alleppey, Quilon and Kumarakom in Kerala at a competitive price.

http://www.southtourism.com/
